about_the_game:
The Story


Elaine
It’s been five hundred years since the unified nations denounced superstition. In this age of reason, Elaine, the recent Queen of Vallis, has become the most celebrated ruler. So beloved by her people to be dubbed the ‘Millenium Queen’, the ‘Sun Queen’.

Diane
It is this love that makes it all the more unfortunate that she has met an untimely demise. To her only daughter, Crown Princess Diane, she leaves behind a kingdom in mourning. And though the rising sun dries her subjects’ tears, a growing shadow still lurks behind them.

You
It is up to Diane to protect her people from this looming threat. It is up to you to decide how she does so.

A Dynamic Experience

Create your own unique story woven together from hundreds of variables, events, and characters.

Meaningful Choices

Engage in choices that aim to define the parts of Diane's personality that are yet to be established.

  • Is duty her biggest concern or is she busy trying to distract herself from her mother's death?

  • Does she want to make friends or does she fill the void with exploring the world around her?

  • Will she strive to maintain her mother's legacy or aim for it's destruction?

Mystery and Intrigue

Build a roster of pawns and companions as Diane engages in a game of intrigue.


Discover secrets hidden even from the members of the royal family.

name: For Queen and Country Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The world’s 1st Interactive Novel. Experience the story of Diane, a crown princess dealing with the ramifications of her mother’s untimely death. Define and transform Diane’s personality through your choices and watch the consequences unfold.
